location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 20: William Hornby, Robert Gambier, Thomas Day, John Torlesse, Robert Sparks, Charles Bourchier, Richard Church, James Morley and Alexander Callander, Council at Bombay Castle, to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter acknowledges the receipt of Edward Galley's letters of 7 June and 21 August 1783, and reports the imminent dispatch of supplies of broad cloth and long ells for the Bushire and Bussora [Basra] markets. Enclosed with the letter are extracts from the Honourable Company's commands, dated 26 September 1782, 15 and 23 January 1783 and 6 March 1783 respectively.
